# Remove Nausea (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[Apostle of Peace (PrC)|Apostle of peace]] 3, [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC)Â­, pg. 105

*Remove nausea* restores to health a creature who is [[Nauseated|nauseated]] or [[Sickened|sickened]]. *Remove nausea* cures only the nausea or sickening effect, not disease, poison, or any other effects.
